title: Remove Androidplot dependency
message:
Remove Androidplot dependency

It's been nothing but trouble.

Of course this makes the whole thing not build any more, so we need to replace
Androidplot with something.

My current thinking is DIY; our needs with the vertical reboot bars, the text
for app upgrades and the horizontal lines are pretty specific to us.

The current thinking is that just having a canvas with scaling and clipping
should get us quite far.

title: Improve logging of failed file renames
message:
Improve logging of failed file renames

For some user file renames keep failing, meaning that all sampling on his / her
tablet doesn't work.

This change is an attempt to understand *why* the renaming fails, by being more
verbose about the status of the source and destination path names on failure.

title: Attempt to work around Android issue 69276
message:
Attempt to work around Android issue 69276

You can get a TransactionTooLargeException from
PackageManager.getInstalledPackages().

Workaround from http://stackoverflow.com/a/30062632/473672, thanks!

https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=69276

title: Improve getEventsSince() logging
message:
Improve getEventsSince() logging

Seems like the previous system state is newer than the current one.

With this change in place, when that happens we include both the previous
state's timestamp and the current state's timestamp in the exception message.
And at least part of the system timestamp is included as part of the log
message.

title: Uninvent our own private logging
message:
Uninvent our own private logging

We used to log sampling exceptions to a world-readable file to be able
to find exceptions thrown by the sampling service on a real device.

But considering the whole point of this branch is to make logs
accessible even on real devices, that functionality has no value here.

message:
Avoid sampling service ANRs

message:
Fix ClassCastException

title: Make tests pass reliably again
message:
Make tests pass reliably again

Tests started to fail intermittently due to rounding issues showing up
when we started basing our timestamps on [now] rather than on some
arbitrary time in the past.

This change adds +-5s fuzz when comparing timestamps, which hides the
rounding errors (and is fine as a margin anyway since we're talking hour
long intervals).

Yay, reliable tests!

title: Improve zoom animation performance
message:
Improve zoom animation performance

This change basically puts all sample dots in the same series, which
when tested on a real-world phone improved the (lousy) zoom performance
from about 140ms/frame to about 100ms/frame.

Still not very good but a lot better.

title: Make initial animation a bit less jerky
message:
Make initial animation a bit less jerky

This is done by delaying it 250ms. It gets the worst pause down from
about 140ms to about 70ms in my tests.

message:
Log animation performance numbers after zooming

The zoom animations can sometimes feel jerky, this is an attempt at
getting metrics for that.

but they worked differently / not at all on some tested devices. With

Also add text about that you can double tap to zoom.

message:
Fix an edge case crash

The edge case happens when you charge your phone short enough that both
the before and after samples says "draining", but long enough that the
after sample has higher charge percentage than the before one.

Closes #1

title: Fix startup and orientation-change performance
message:
Fix startup and orientation-change performance

Before this change we happened to (not by design) perform a sampling
during app startup. We now delay that sampling by at least 30s,
improving startup time and orientation-change performance by a lot.

title: Startup time improvements
message:
Startup time improvements

Speed up in-the-fast-simulator startup time from about 300ms for setting
up the plot to 100-150ms for setting up the plot.

This change basically switches AndroidPlot from reading settings from
XML files to storing the settings in the Java source code.

title: Find out why the simulator showed no graph
message:
Find out why the simulator showed no graph

It was because it had real data, albeit only a little. If there's any
real data, it won't show the fake data.

title: Use averages rather than medians for drain lines
message:
Use averages rather than medians for drain lines

The numbers we're trying to summarize are quantized, so averages will
give us a much truer representation of what the drain has actually been
over a period.

title: Don't show > 25%/h battery usage
message:
Don't show > 25%/h battery usage

We sometimes get outliers all the way up to 400%/h. This change prevents
them from making the graph unreadable.

title: Make double tapping zoom out as much as possible
message: Make double tapping zoom out as much as possible

title: Tune the zoom sensitivity
message: Tune the zoom sensitivity

title: Don't show zero drain
message:
Don't show zero drain

If the service is restarted we can get several readings at the same
battery level. Gaps in the graph are more representative of what
actually happened there than getting zeros in the battery plot.

title: Auto-start service after device reboot
message:
Auto-start service after device reboot

And log shutdown and boot events

title: Improve initial plot sizing
message:
Improve initial plot sizing

The plot is now at least 0-5 units high and at least five minutes wide.

from file.
